knimeNode.name: SQL Inject (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a database port from a database connection and a SQL query.

intro.p: This node is part of the legacy database framework and will be deprecated at the end of 2022. For more information on how to migrate to the new database framework see the migration section of the database documentation.
This node injects an SQL query into a database connection. If the connection already has a query, it will be replaced.

fullDescription.option: The name of the flow variable which contains the SQL query.
